name: inline-style-prefixer
description: Autoprefixer for Inline Style objects using userAgent and caniuse data

scripts.pretest: npm run clean && npm run transpile && npm run generate
scripts.bundle: browserify lib/Prefixer.js --o dist/prefixer.js && uglifyjs dist/prefixer.js -o dist/prefixer.min.js
scripts.build: npm run clean && mkdir dist && npm run transpile && npm run generate && npm run bundle

author: Robin Frischmann
